headerDisplay:
Kasa Python Plugin.

Most users do not require configuration and can just click "Save" to get started. See [README](https://github.com/ZeliardM/homebridge-kasa-python/blob/master/README.md) for more information.

enableCredentials.title: Enable Credentials
enableCredentials.description: Enable to use username and password for authentication.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username for the Kasa account. Required for cloud devices.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the Kasa account. Required for cloud devices.

powerStrip.title: Create Multi-Outlet Devices as a Power Strip
powerStrip.description: Enable to create a single power strip accessory with multiple outlets, used for models HS107, KP200, HS300, KP303, KP400, and EP40. Default: false

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check device status in the background (seconds)

additionalBroadcasts.title: Additional Broadcast Addresses
additionalBroadcasts.description: List of additional broadcast addresses to discover devices on. Format: 192.168.1.255

manualDevices.title: Manual List Of Devices
manualDevices.description: List of devices to manually add. Format: 192.168.1.100

waitTimeUpdate.title: Wait Time Update (milliseconds)
waitTimeUpdate.description: The time to wait to combine similar commands for a device before sending a command to a device (milliseconds). Default: 100.

username.description: Username for the Kasa account. Required for cloud devices.

password.description: Password for the Kasa account. Required for cloud devices.

layout.helpvalue: Username and Password will be required for specific devices only.

layout.title: HomeKit (Optional)
layout.description: Customize how devices are exposed in HomeKit

items.title: Additional Broadcasts
items.description: Specify additional broadcast addresses for device discovery.

items.title: Manual Devices
items.description: If automatic discovery is not working, try this.

items.helpvalue: Before resorting to manually specifying devices. Try setting the broadcast address and check your router/switch/firewall configuration. You must assign static IP addresses to your devices to use this configuration.
